frontmatter.title: I don’t want to be perceived
frontmatter.description: Today of all days, the last thing I want to do is be perceived, yet I am writing this blog post, as a challenge to myself as to what it means to be perceived, and that it's not as unsafe as it feels.
keywords: why it's hard to show up
starting over in a new city
